r.s: Provides an implementation of the RFC2033 LMTP protocol
r.d: Provides an implementation of the RFC2033 LMTP using PEAR's Net_Socket and Auth_SASL class.
r.n: * Removed dependency on Auth_SASL, but if installed automatically uses it probiding DIGEST-MD5 and CRAM-MD5 auth methods * Marked as stable
